title: Manage Autonomous Haulage Fleet
description: A control room operator oversees a fleet of autonomous haul trucks, monitoring for obstacles and managing system exceptions.

tasks.description: Monitor the autonomous haulage system dashboard, which shows the location and status of all autonomous trucks.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator has full visibility of the autonomous fleet.

tasks.description: Receive an alert that an autonomous truck has stopped because its sensors have detected an unknown obstacle on the haul road (e.g., a fallen rock).
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator is alerted to the exception.

tasks.description: Dispatch a manned vehicle to remove the obstacle. Once clear, remotely instruct the autonomous truck to resume its mission.
tasks.expected_outcome: The exception is safely managed, and the autonomous truck resumes its task.
